name: Steven Paprika Adventure DEMO 1.0
description:
Steven Paprika Adventure DEMO 1.0 is an epic 2D platformer. Plunge into the world of mysteries and much more! You in the role of the famous youtuber save the world from the capture of a super agent. At first glance, the game is unremarkable project that takes place in a couple of minutes, but not so simple... The game has a long storyline that will not get bored. The complexity of the game is extreme, from the slightest mistake start the level again. Also in the game a few endings to find them read into the dialogues and make the right decision. Use your brain, you have to think a lot and solve puzzles. For the wrong answer should be punished, because of which will have to start the level again. At the moment, the game is in the DEMO stage. It does not reveal the plot and ending. It shows the mechanics of the game, parts of the gameplay. You can speed up the release of a new DEMO version or release of the game... Leave comments with your wishes and advice. Believe me it is very motivating. Well, download the game and... Enjoy the game!

The main character is Steven Paprika - a Youtuber who saves the world from a secret agent Snake.
